ContainedSprite.name: A.B.Y.S.S. WarSuit In Vertical Locker
A.B.Y.S.S. WarSuit Behind Window
A.B.Y.S.S. WarSuit In Horizontal Locker

Item.name: A.B.Y.S.S. WarSuit body Classic green
Item.description: The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' or 'WarSuit', is a new generation divesuit granting much greater speed and protection to it's user.Due to it's weight, it requires a Battery Rod power source to move normaly, and an oxygen source to be out in the water. Note: You don't need the oxygen source while in an oxygenated enviroment, but equiping the oxygen source will deplete it. MkI is the 'cheapest' variation, providing inmunity to burns and husk infections, and turns any stun into a ministun (DOES NOT count paralysis). Protects against Standard pressures. Energy depleted ONLY when oxygen is on.

Item.description: Full suit version, compatible with npc's behavior. The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' or 'WarSuit', is a new generation divesuit granting much greater speed and protection to it's user.Due to it's weight, it requires a Battery Rod power source to move normaly, and an oxygen source to be out in the water. MkI is the 'cheapest' variation, providing inmunity to burns and husk infections, and turns any stun into a ministun (DOES NOT count paralysis). Protects against Standard pressures. Energy depleted ONLY when oxygen is on.
